metadata.Title: CVE-2014-9884 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: drivers/misc/qseecom.c in the Qualcomm components in Android before2016-08-05 on Nexus 5 and 7 (2013) devices does not validate certainpointers, which allows attackers to gain privileges via a craftedapplication, aka Android internal bug 28769920 and Qualcomm internal bugCR580740.

criterions.comment: linux-goldfish: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
